dmca.title: [ABUSE] ceast and desist-re: the advice sisters web site
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page http://3311.iuecg.info/
<http://3311.iuecg.info/>   any of the material that you claim is being
infringed as of 3:50:32 p.m. (GMT-6).

 

Legal Response Team

ThePlanet.com 


________________________________

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Alison Blackman
Dunham for The Advice Sisters
Posted At: Wednesday, June 14, 2006 12:19 PM
Posted To: Microsoft Office Outlook Embedded Message
Conversation: [ABUSE] ceast and desist-re: the advice sisters web site
Subject: [ABUSE] ceast and desist-re: the advice sisters web site


         
We have noticed that your web site: http://3311.iuecg.info/  referencing
the Advice Sisters is NOT pointing to our own Relationship Tools for
Winner Web site at http://www.advicesisters.net  but to your own page
at: http://3086.fdlzk.info/
 
We are certain, based on the way other links are pointing on your site,
that the error is intential.  Please correct to our valid url
immediately, or remove any reference to The Advice Sisters from your
site(s).  Note that the following notice appears on every poage of the
Advice Sisters Web Sites:
Copyright (c) 2006 all rights reserved by Alison Blackman Dunham of THE
ADVICE SISTERS(r)  The Advice Sisters is a registered United States
trademark. No portion of this web site, including illustrations,  may be
copied or used in any without written permission of THE ADVICE SISTERS.
E-Mail: advicesisters@advicesisters.net. The content contained in this
web site is based upon what works in the real world, but it should not
be considered a substitute for professional, in-person counseling.
 
We are certain you will not delay in complying with our request, but are
prepared to take any legal action necessary if you do not.
 
Sincerely
 
Alison Blackman Dunham 


Alison Blackman Dunham (aka. "Advice Sister Alison")

The Advice Sisters http://www.advicesisters.net
<http://www.advicesisters.net/> 

My Blog http://www.advicesisters.net/advicesistersblog

Celebrate Spring contest: 
http://www.advicesisters.net/springcontest1.html
